item.title: Dead tree outside 116 Wickham Way, 14th August
item.description:
Tree has died. Could it be replaced with a sapling please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Dunstan's Lane, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amounts of litter on pavements on both sides of Bugsbys Way between Peninsula Park Road and Horn Lane, 14th August
item.description:
Ongoing litter problem on Bugsby Way which appears not to have been swept for a long time. It’s extremely unsightly and unpleasant for pedestrians. This area needs to be regularly swept given the number of food outlets in the area and the large footfall of shoppers.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bugsby's Way, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes in Alderney Road & Grange way, 14th August
item.description:
Have reported issues with potholes several times & no fixtures have been made. Alderney Road in Slade Green an issue and road leading of Grange way even worse. No inspection has been made to my knowledge. Thank you Juliet
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alderney Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Rubbish piling up in shrubbery.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ancona Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Waste all over Craig’s Court, 14th August
item.description:
Waste dumped all over Craig’s Court - cardboard and other waste.mixed in household bin together with commercial waste and recycling bins full of crushed glass cooking utensils Street cleaner seen taking a break - not actually cleaning and using recycling bin instead of his own - why is this allowed to go on for so long ?!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Craig's Court, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 14th August
item.description:

item.title: Litter on Ardleigh Road, 14th August
item.description:
Littering is worse all over De Beauvoir and I barely see the litter pickers any more. There needs to be better education on littering and sadly more litter picking is needed to keep this borough liveable and pleasant generally.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ardleigh Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste dumped in Craig’s Court, 14th August
item.description:
Card board addressed to ellercove and other businesses dumped in houshold and next to the household bin. cooking devices crushed glass urine feces everywhere. Streetcleaner dumping leaves in recycling bin - cigarette disposal from pubs plastic buckets full of food and worse - why is this tolerated?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Craig's Court, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household items dumped on street, 14th August
item.description:
Household items dumped on the street creating a mess and trip hazard on pavements.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ardleigh Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Living in van, 14th August
item.description:
This vehicle has been here for at least 3 months now. It hasn’t once moved as someone is residing there. It’s taking up space on the road, but mainly a health a safety hazard as it smells very strongly of human waste and causing mess as referenced in photos. It’s also concerning having to walk past the vehicle. It needs to be asked to move on and areas needs cleaning. It smells very bad and is causing damage

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gwydor Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown Hedge near Ravensbourne River., 14th August
item.description:
The Hedge is Overgrown and causing Problems Walking along the Path next to the River, Brambles are sticking out. Please can this Be Cut back urgently. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Vale, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trolley full of dumped suitcases alongside 58 Aldeburgh St, 14th August
item.description:
Dumped suitcases in trolley, needs to be cleared. There’s also another dumped suitcase on top of the traffic light control box at the junction of Fearon Street and Pear Tree Way which has been there for several weeks. And a dumped flower pot containing a dead plant + soil alongside 23 Fearon Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aldeburgh Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
